name: Ecosan Services Foundation

address: First Floor, 24 Prashant Nagar, 721/1 Navi Peth
Off LBS Road, Near Kaka Halwai

briefDescription: ESF is a non-profit organization operating in the water and sanitation sector. Our core areas are capacity building, consulting and funded projects related to ecological sanitation, school sanitation, and natural wastewater treatment solutions. We have conducted projects across India.
